summary: The 'Trafficking Reduction And Criminal Enforcement Act' (TRACE Act) aims to prevent the illegal sale of firearms. Key provisions include requiring a second, hidden serial number on firearms, extending the retention period for instant background check records, mandating physical inventory checks by licensed firearms dealers, and eliminating certain limitations on the use of funds related to firearms regulations. The bill amends existing laws within Title 18 of the United States Code and various appropriations acts.
